ground_truth.thought: 获取一些生物医药企业的融资案例
ground_truth.name: BioFinance.get_funding_cases

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BioFinance.get_funding_basics', 'description': 'Get the basic concepts and common methods of funding in the biopharmaceutical industry.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_basics', 'description': 'the basic concepts and common methods of funding in the biopharmaceutical industry.'}]}, {'name': 'BioFinance.get_funding_cases', 'description': 'Get some funding cases of biopharmaceutical companies.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_cases', 'description': 'the funding cases of biopharmaceutical companies.'}]}, {'name': 'BioFinance.get_funding_trends', 'description': 'Get the current funding trends in the biopharmaceutical industry.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_trends', 'description': 'the current funding trends in the biopharmaceutical industry.'}]}, {'name': 'BioFinance.get_funding_advice', 'description': 'Get funding advice based on a specific biopharmaceutical project.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'project_description', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the description of the biopharmaceutical project.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_advice', 'description': 'the funding advice for the biopharmaceutical project.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解生物医药的融资途径。首先，获取生物医药融资的基本概念和常见方式。然后，获取一些生物医药企业的融资案例。接着，获取当前生物医药行业的融资趋势。最后，基于我的生物医药项目，提供一些融资建议。
获取生物医药融资的基本概念和常见方式
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数是什么?

{'funding_basics': 'Biopharmaceutical funding typically includes venture capital, private equity, public offerings, and government grants. Common methods include Series A, B, C rounds, IPOs, and strategic partnerships.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'funding_basics': 'Biopharmaceutical funding typically includes venture capital, private equity, public offerings, and government grants. Common methods include Series A, B, C rounds, IPOs, and strategic partnerships.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是获取生物医药领域融资的基本概念和常见方式。
